titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for the Firefighter Challenge.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/21/1995--Introduced. Permits the Congressional Fire Services Institute to host a public event on the Capitol grounds from April 24 until April 27, 1995.
